subject: Inquiry regarding Order #SSN4832- Shipping Status
description_text:
> Hello,

I placed an order (Order #SSN4832) and the tracking number
(YT2600800704718413) was generated on Jan 8th. However, it has been stuck
at "Shipment information received" for 5 days, and the weight is showing as
0.01kg.

Has the package actually been handed over to YunExpress? Please provide the
exact shipping status. If it hasn't been shipped yet, I would like to know
the reason for the delay.

Looking forward to your prompt reply.

conversations.body_text: Hi YOUNG HUN KWON,    I apologize for the delayed response. Here is your shipping tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeks—it's simply too popular. We'll ship it out to you within the next couple of days. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2600800704718413
We apologize for the inconvenience. The logistics provider has reported a customs clearance failure. Please verify your information.
Hi YOUNG HUN KWON,     The logistics provider appears to have updated your information. We have re-updated it and hope everything goes smoothly.

Hello, this is Order SSN4832.

My PCCC(Personal Customs Clearance Code) is P160019891061

Provinced And States - 서울특별시 ->Seoul
City - 영등포구 -> Yeongdeungpo-Gu

See Image for more information

2026년 1월 17일 (토) AM 11:55, support@simsonn.com
Hi YOUNG HUN KWON,      Alright, thank you for your prompt reply.
